short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control YouTube video volume with mouse wheel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever watched a video and the volume is so loud. It takes you a few moments of ear deafening to find the volume and lower it. Now, you can control the volume on a YouTube  video with just the scroll wheel now. It goes up and down 5% volume.
